name: And I Wake Up Falling
alt: Rosalia in her typical robe, falling backwards.
description: The idea for this came to her in a dream, in which she found herself falling helplessly for hours.

name: Cover
alt: Rosalia surrounded by white feathers.
description: The feathers were a sign of a blessing from her Goddess, and this was a moment she wanted to remember forever.

name: Dance of the Dove
alt: Rosalia proceeding down a castle hallway.
description: Rosalia generally doesn't like looking fancy, but when the local princess invites you to a ball, there's really not much choice.

name: Delicate Angel
alt: Rosalia leaning back, her legs in the air.
description: Someone told her people would love this pose - and of course, she was gullible enough to believe it.

name: Disbelief
alt: Rosalia defeated in battle, covered in blood.
description: Unused to defeat, Rosalia struggles to process the fact that someone's swordplay was better than her own.

name: Entangled Emotions
alt: Rosalia performing a jump strike.
description: When she has to deliver a killing blow, she does so quickly and painlessly - but always struggles with the idea of taking a life.

name: Follow Me
alt: Rosalia in a lace dress.
description: Rosalia loves to show Becca her latest find - though it's usually a pretty flower, not something relevant to the adventure.

name: Oasis
alt: Rosalia on the beach, wearing a blue and white bikini.
description: She enjoys spending time at the beach, listening to the ocean as it waves, watching the birds fly overhead.

name: Rosalia
alt: Rosalia wearing her standard white robe.
description: This portrait was commissioned for her by the royal guard after she had completed her training.

name: Soar
alt: Rosalia looking blissful.
description: Rosalia often finds her thoughts drifting, and felt this was a good way to represent that.

name: Song of the Nightingale
alt: Rosalia brandishing her sword, ready to fight.
description: Ready for a fight, Rosalia raises her sword to defend the innocent and smite the unjust.

name: The Beautiful Question
alt: Rosalia on her hands and knees, an inquisitive look on her face.
description: Rosalia is not the investigator that Becca is, and often finds herself with ideas that others might not consider to be good.

name: Warrior
alt: Rosalia in the woods with her sword.
description: She often trains in the woods, where it's harder to see an attack coming her way. This keeps her defensive skills well-honed.

name: Our Playful Hero
alt: Rosalia resting on her sword, smiling.
description: Rosalia enjoys using her sword, but mainly in practise matches - real combat is far less enjoyable.

name: Between the Raindrops
alt: Rosalia standing in the rain in a dark forest.
description: As a child, Rosalia was relentless in her training. She would let nothing stop her, not even the weather.

name: Sunday Best
alt: Young Rosalia, wearing a frilled white dress, sitting down.
description: As a child, Rosalia was much more extravagant in her attire. She now understands the practicality of a robe instead of a frilly dress.

name: Will of the Heart
alt: Rosalia using her magic to create a glowing green heart.
description: Most people who discover they have magic use it destructively, but even as a child Rosalia looked to spread love and peace.

name: Divine Elegance
alt: Rosalia wearing a nice robe.
description: Many consider Rosalia to be naturally beautiful, her elegance subtle but effortless.

name: Gateway of Roses
alt: Rosalia standing in an archway, roses at her feet.
description: She enjoys spending time in nature - roses are her favourite flower, because they remind her of her name.

name: Swift Justice
alt: Rosalia preparing to strike with her sword.
description: Rosalia's blade is always swift and true. Her conviction never falters, and her strike never wavers.

name: The Sweetest Smile
alt: A portrait of Rosalia.
description: Rosalia commissioned this portrait to put in a locket for Becca, but has yet to find the perfect locket.

name: A Night on the Town
alt: Rosalia in an evening gown.
description: All dressed up for a date with Becca, Rosalia is not used to looking so... glamorous.
